t: Amazon Brand Registry | Vender en Amazon
s: Debes ser el propietario de la marca registrada. Si eres un agente autorizado, pídele al propietario de la marca registrada que inscriba la marca y te añada como usuario adicional de la cuenta de Brand Registry.

t: Amazon.com: : Todos los departamentos
s: Sí. Si desean comprar juntos, escaneen o deslicen una sola vez y luego entren juntos por la puerta. Los productos que tú o alguien con quien hayas entrado tomen se cargarán al medio de pago que utilizaste para abrir la puerta.

t: Basic Guide for Beginners: Sell on Amazon ES
s: Fulfilment by Amazon is the ultimate solution for building and growing your brand identity around the world. Choose which countries you want to expand into to start selling products in Europe and let Amazon store and distribute those items based on expected customer demand, at no additional cost.

t: Amazon Brand Registry Spain: Protect and build your brand
s: Start your brand’s Amazon journey by enrolling it in Amazon Brand Registry for free. After enrolling, you become eligible to activate a suite of brand-building tools and protection benefits. You can enroll your brand even if you don’t sell in the Amazon store.

t: Amazon (company) - Wikipedia
s: 13 hours ago - The company launched in 2005 in Dubai, United Arab Emirates and served multiple areas across the Middle East. On March 28, 2017, Amazon acquired Souq.com for $580 million. The company was re-branded as Amazon and its infrastructure was used to expand Amazon's online platform in the Middle East.
